dcterms:creator: F. Martelli
N. Kalach
G. Tola
R. Navigli
dcterms:description: A dataset for multilingual and cross-lingual word-in-context disambiguation, containing training and testing subsets for languages including Arabic, Chinese, English, French, and Russian. The dataset is structured in JSON format with.data and.gold files, providing unique IDs, target lemmas, parts of speech, sentences, and indices.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2021 Task 2: Multilingual and Cross-lingual Word-in-Context Disambiguation
